about.title: More about
about.subtitle: About
about.description: Hi, I'm Daryl Fernandes, a passionate software engineer dedicated to building intelligent and scalable solutions. I specialize in AI automation, cloud computing, and full-stack development, crafting efficient and user-centric applications. With experience in Python, FastAPI, and modern web technologies, I love solving complex problems through innovation. Let's connect and build something amazing!
about.shortdescription: Experienced Software Engineer specializing in AI automation, cloud computing, and full-stack development. Passionate about building scalable, innovative solutions that enhance user experiences.
